TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，可擷取目前元件能夠存取的資料來源清單。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供方法，可用來擷取目前的設計階段元件能夠存取的資料來源的清單。 provides methods that can be used to retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current design-time component. 這個型別轉換子由[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]以提供出現在清單中的資料來源中的值**屬性**視窗。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data sources in the **Properties** window. > [!CAUTION] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to:實作類型轉換器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#4)]

span.span: How to: Implement a Type Converter

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection
public: override System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter::StandardValuesCollection ^ GetStandardValues(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);
override this.GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

param.name: context
param.span: ，表示要取得值的元件或控制項。

span.span: An indicating the component or control to get values for.

summary.span: 取得控制項可以存取的標準資料來源。

span.span: Gets the standard data sources accessible to the control.

returns.span: ，列出標準的可存取資料來源。

span.span: A listing the standard accessible data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件能夠存取的資料來源取決於從設計工具中，測試每個元件，以擷取元件的清單方法，然後再傳回有效的資料來源的元件。The data sources that are accessible to the component are determined by retrieving a list of components from the designer, testing each component with the method, and then returning the components that are valid data sources.

span.span: if the returned from is an exclusive list of all possible values; if other values are possible.

returns.span: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法永遠傳回 。

span.span: As implemented in this class, this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是獨占清單 (例如在列舉資料型別中)，則沒有其他有效值。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果清單不是獨佔的則有其他有效值的標準清單值 besides提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

para.span: 如果您想要轉換的型別支援標準值，請覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidDataSource(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function IsValidDataSource (component As IComponent) As Boolean

abstract member IsValidDataSource : System.ComponentModel.IComponent -> bool override this.IsValidDataSource : System.ComponentModel.IComponent -> bool

param.name: component
param.span: 要檢查是否為有效資料來源的元件。

span.span: The component to check as a valid data source.

summary.span: 指出指定的元件是否為這個轉換子的有效資料來源。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source for this converter.

returns.span: 如果 實作 或 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if implements or ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用方法，以判斷可用的標準可存取的資料來源的元件。The method uses the method to determine the components that are available as standard accessible data sources. 針對類別，有效的資料來源是一個元件可實作或介面。For the class, a valid data source is a component that implements the or interface.

para.span: 自訂資料來源轉換子可以衍生自類別，並覆寫方法，來測試做為資料來源使用的元件所需的介面實作。

span.span: Custom data source converters can derive from the class, and override the method, to test for the interface implementations that are required to use a component as a data source.
